title: Continental Breakfast
description: continental breakfast will have some combination of fruit, muffins, bagels, cereal, bread, croissants, pastries, waffles, yogurt, juice, milk, tea, and fresh coffee. Additionally, there will be butter, jam/jelly, cream, and sugar available. You can see the cereal, milk, fruit, and coffee.

title: Bangladeshi Breakfast
description: Bangladeshi breakfast consists of Roti (flat bread), Nun Roti,  Paratha with Sabji (mix of cooked vegetables) and Dahl (lentil curry) Eggs Omlet or Boiled Eggs.

title: Traditional wedding food
description: Special Polau Rice with Kabab, Chicken Roast, Special Salad, Jorda Rice or Firni(Pudding),Mutton Rejala, Egg Korma and Borhani-Wedding Special/Cold Drinks

title: Traditional Bangladeshi Lunch
description: White Steamed Rice with Thick Dal, Dal Fry, Potato Bharta, Begun Bharta,Shrimp Bharta, Shutki Bharta, Taki Fish Bharta, Fried Fish, Egg Bharta, Korola Bharta

title: Biriyani Packages
description: 4 Types of Most Popular Biriyani included in this package. Kachi Biriyani(Chinigura Chal), Special Kachi Biriyani(Basmati), Morog Polao with Chicken Roast, Special Chicken Vhuna Kichuri

title: Catering Services-On Demand
description: Catering Services of different Ocassions like Wedding, Birthday, Home party, Office Party, Engagement Party, Eniversery Party or any kind of parties. we provide special Catering services
